div.p: Records of Paridae pox in great tit submitted in 2006–2009 (red dots), 2010–2013 (purple) and 2014–2016 (blue). Graphs show population growth (mean annual change) for each delineated region for 1994–2005 (black, i.e. before Paridae pox emergence) and 2006–2016 (grey, i.e. after Paridae pox emergence). Points indicate the mean estimate, thicker bars indicate ±1 standard error and thin bars indicate 95% confidence limits. Regions follow the Government Office/NUTS boundaries.
